cpw.mods.fml.common.registry

Interface VillagerRegistry.IVillageCreationHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    VillagerRegistry

    public static interface VillagerRegistry.IVillageCreationHandler
    Allow access to the net.minecraft.world.gen.structure.StructureVillagePieces array controlling new village creation so you can insert your own new village pieces
    Author:
    cpw
